head.title: About Phenomic base theme

body:
You are currently viewing Phenomic base theme.

For now Phenomic does not provide a native way to extend themes but since it's based on React and uses a component approach, it's pretty easy to make your own reusable collection of layouts and components.

This website is made with Phenomic.

If you are curious about it, you can take a look at existing websites that use Phenomic, some projects share their source code!

Built with React .
